MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the EH36 postcode area of Humbie. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 5.40pm to change faulty equipment on the overhead line at Windymains Farm and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 7.40pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5.11pm on Wednesday 21st October2020.
